text: Saza sabathabatha aBantwana bakwaSirayeli Sabaweza ulwandle, UFir’awn nomkhosi wakhe wabalandela nengcinezelo nobutshaba, de wafunyanwa kukurhaxwa, (waqala) wathi: “Ndiyakholwa okokuba akakho omnye ofanelwe kukunqulwa ngaphandle kwaKhe (uAllâh) loWo aBantwana bakwaSirayeli bakholwa kuYe, yaye mna ndingomnye wamaMuslim.”
